item.title: Dokcli An Open Source API Documentation Tool
item.description: Dokcli is an open source API Documentation tool, consisting of 🙈 ⚡ Link to heading built-in Rapidoc web component support Swagger & OpenAPI Spec Convenient way of hosting Api Documentation in 1 file For documentation and examples, please visit https://github.com/Shoaibashk/dokcli 🚧 Please keep in mind that Dokcli is still under active development ⚗️ and therefore full backward compatibility is not guaranteed before reaching v1.0.0 Overview ✨ Link to heading Dokcli could be downloaded directly as a standalone app for API Documentation using Swagger & OpenAPI spec file.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there ❗ Link to heading I’m Shoaib, a software developer from India 🇮🇳. I do mostly web and mobile development. I like to work on (C#, Go, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Flutter) Visit the Github website!
